description: This file contains a test script using the 'scenario' testing library to test a vegetarian recipe agent. It includes test setup, scenario definition, and an agent implementation class.

classes.name: VegetarianRecipeAgent
classes.description: An agent class that interacts with an OpenAI model to generate vegetarian recipes.

methods.name: run
methods.description: Executes the agent with a given message, maintaining conversation history and returning the response content.
